```js
function getProp() {
  return 42;
}

class MyClass {
  myProp = getProp();

  constructor() {
    // Oh noes!
    function getProp() {
      return 'ugh';
    }
  }
}
```

Desugaring:

```js
function getProp() {
  return 42;
}

class MyClass {
  constructor() {
    /* start autogenerated code */
    this.myProp = getProp();
    /* end autogenerated code */

    // Oh noes!
    function getProp() {
      return 'ugh';
    }
  }
}
```
